songs.title: Piece of Me
songs.album: Piece Of Me b/w Come On In
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You've been the best of times
You walk me through my darkest days
Why must I turn around
I ask myself (I don't know)

This just ain't fair
So hard to bear
(it's not fair)

I'm not really sure these days
Sure these days
Sure these days

I've stashed the memories to ease the pain
You've been dear to me
That's why it's hard to walk away (walk away)

Remember when it was simple things (simple things)
I'm not really sure these days

[Chorus]
I'll let you take a piece of me
I hope you get the peace you need
And if that's not enough
I'll let you go peacefully, ah yeah

[Verse 2]
You've been around so long
You did me wrong
But it made me strong
I believed in you
You believed in me
To lean on you (lean on you)

But when I reached for you, you were not there (you're not home)
I'm not really sure these days
Sure these days
Sure these days

Blood is thicker than mud ya know
It may sound simple but that's all I know (all I know)
Even though he's hurting me, but I pray they see (pray they see)
Even though they're hurting me we're still family

[Chorus]
I'll let you take a piece of me
I hope you get the peace you need
And if that's not enough
I'll let you go peacefully, ah yeah

[Bridge]
Let it be, let it be
Harmony, harmony

[Chorus]
And if that's not enough...
I'll let you take a piece of me
I hope you get the peace you need
And if that's not enough
I'll let you go peacefully, ah yeah
